titleStmt.title: A description of the last voyage to Bermudas, in the ship Marygold, S.P. commander by J.H ... ; begun November the twelfth, 1670, and ending May the third, 1671 with allowance.
titleStmt.author: J. H. (John Hardy)

notesStmt.note: Dedication, "to the Right Honorable the Governor and company of London for plantation of the Summer islands", signed: John Hardy; dedications to the commander and officers of the Marygold signed: John Hardie.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
